content.raw:
I don't know why we have type-specific casts. The following compiles for me (though I haven't tested the run-time effects):
~~~
diff -r 9f86947c3629 gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc
--- a/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc	Tue May 12 14:52:35 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc	Tue May 12 16:34:36 2015 -0700
@@ -895,7 +895,7 @@
   std::ostringstream ogreHandle;
 
 #if defined(__APPLE__)
-  ogreHandle << reinterpret_cast<uint64_t>(this->winId());
+  ogreHandle << this->winId();
 #elif defined(WIN32)
   ogreHandle << reinterpret_cast<uint64_t>(this->renderFrame->winId());
 #else
~~~
